moves.5. O-O d6 6. d3 Na5 7. b3: Better was 7. Bb3. now there is a great weakness on the black squares.
moves.8. bxc4 O-O 9. Rb1: 9. Nd5 is worth looking. also 9. Na4.
moves.9... c6 10. Na4 Bb6 11. Nxb6: opens black a file. whites a pawn is lost...
moves.11... axb6 12. a3 Bg4 13. h3 Bh5 14. Bb2:
there is no good place for white's bishop.
i think Be3 was better.
moves.15. Ra1: holding to the a pawn. it is better to give it and start move the forces to the king side.
moves.15... Qf6 16. d4 Ra4 17. dxe5: white is left with two "stupid" pawns on the c file. it is unplayable...
moves.18. Bxe5 dxe5 19. Qd7:
white falls apart.
leaving his king with no defense against black's queen and rook, white is in a poor position.
moves.19... Bxf3 20. g3 Rxc4 21. Qd3 Bxe4: nothing to annotate from now forth...
